CustomField.description: Populated automatically. IF NJ_SLA_Number__c is null and Billing State = New Jersey OR ShippingState = New Jersey AND Effective Date > (2022, 1, 1) AND Stage__c = 'In Processing' AND Record Type = 'Founder Shield' OR Record Type = (Re Shield) OR Record Type = 'Alpha Root'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically populated if Billing/Shipping state = NJ, SL Policy = true, policy stage = In Processing
CustomField.label: NJ SLA Number
